content: अतंत्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Having no ropes or musical strings (as a musical instrument); नातंत्री वाद्यते वीणा <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} Unrestrained; not necessarily binding; not being the object of the rule under consideration; थस्वग्रहणमतंत्रं, क्लीबत्वं °त्रं <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--3@} Without formulas or empirical actions.
